system.classDetails:
Core Moogle Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Wisdom increases by 2.
  • Lifespan: Despite their fragile-looking builds, moogles live surprisingly long lives. Moogles tend to live to about 150, and are considered full adults around 25-30.
  • Size: Small; Moogles have a short stature. Their head to foot height is usually around 3-4 feet tall. If you count their ears, as moogles tend to, they stand about a foot taller than that. Moogles are surprisingly light, weighing around 30-60 lbs.
    As a small creature, you have the following traits:@Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.LMD5GMTR7NHVUKEC]{Small}
  • Speed: Your base ground speed is 30 feet.
  • Languages: You can speak, read, and write Common.
  • Moogle Pom: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.B9OHNEJE9TV56PNN]{Moogle Pom}
  • Mood Pom: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.BPUPRFQU4412XYDG]{Mood Pom}
  • Aether Acclimatized: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.IZM8FZJEUT1NGAC6]{Aether Acclimatized}
  • Mognet: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.HUEAHUTF1LPGMBAZ]{Mognet}
